titlepage.p: © 2008 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Materials relating to conditions in the Santo Tomás Internment Camp in the Philippines during World War II include a booklet, memorabilia, and miscellanea. In addition, programs and commemorative medals relate to the proclamation of Philippine independence and the inauguration of President Manuel Roxas in 1946.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research. The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Myrene Cassel papers,, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1988.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Cassel was an American internee in Santo Tomás Internment Camp, Philippines, during World War II.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Materials relating to conditions in the Santo Tomás Internment Camp in the Philippines during World War II include a booklet, memorabilia, and miscellanea. In addition, programs and commemorative medals relate to the proclamation of Philippine independence and the inauguration of President Manuel Roxas in 1946.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
